default_settings.name: Keyboard: Disabling accent character pop-up
default_settings.description: Disable press-and-hold accent character pop-up in favor of key repeat

default_settings.name: Keyboard: 0-delay key repeat
default_settings.description: Sets a blazingly fast key repeat

default_settings.name: Keyboard: 0-delay initial key repeat
default_settings.description: Sets a blazingly fast initial key repeat

default_settings.name: Finder: Dark mode
default_settings.description: Enables macOS's dark mode
default_settings.check_command: osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to tell appearance preferences to get dark mode'
default_settings.command: osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to tell appearance preferences to set dark mode to true'

default_settings.name: Finder: Shows hard drives on desktop
default_settings.description: Shows all internal hard drives on the desktop

default_settings.name: Finder: Shows external hard drives on desktop
default_settings.description: Shows all external hard drives on the desktop

default_settings.name: Finder: Shows removable media on desktop
default_settings.description: Shows all removable media drives on the desktop

default_settings.name: Battery: Shows battery percentage
default_settings.description: Shows the battery percent remaining in the global top-right context menu

default_settings.name: Trackpad: Sets trackpad acceleration
default_settings.description: Sets the trackpad acceleration to a comfortable value (to disable set to -1)

default_settings.name: Trackpad: Disables 'natural' scrolling
default_settings.description: Disables the 'natural' (ha sure in apple's dreams) trackpad scrolling

default_settings.name: Trackpad: Enables App expose gesture
default_settings.description: Enables swiping down with 3 fingers to show all apps side-by-side

default_settings.name: Disk: Disables iCloud default saving location
default_settings.description: Disables saving to iCloud by default for new files

default_settings.name: Disk: Disables .DS_Store files on network volumes
default_settings.description: Disables writing .DS_Store metadata files on networked volumes

default_settings.name: Dock: Enable autohiding
default_settings.description: Turns on dock autohiding when cursor is not over the dock

default_settings.name: Dock: Enable application magnification
default_settings.description: Turns on magnification of an application when hovering over it in the dock

default_settings.name: Dock: Set unmagnified tilesize
default_settings.description: Sets the size of applications in the dock when not magnified

default_settings.name: Dock: Set magnified tilesize
default_settings.description: Sets the size of applications in the dock when magnified

default_settings.name: Dock: Adds 'recent applications' stack
default_settings.description: Adds an application stack to the Dock showing recently used applications
default_settings.check_command: defaults read com.apple.Dock persistent-others | grep recents-tile

default_settings.name: Dock: Add folder (Applications)
default_settings.description: Adds the application folder to the dock
default_settings.check_command: defaults read com.apple.Dock persistent-others | grep '"file-label" = Applications;'

default_settings.name: Dock: Highlight hidden apps
default_settings.description: When an app is hidden from view, highlights the application's dock icon in gray

default_settings.name: Mission Control: Disables automatic re-arranging based on most-recently-used
default_settings.description: Mission control will default to a MRU algorithm, moving the screen. This setting disables that application shuffling.
